title: RemunerationRangeType
description: The minimum and maximum range of work compensation.

typeCode.description: The type of remuneration (e.g. BasePay, Bonus).

referenceAmount.description: A reference to an associated monetary amount. A monetary quantity. An attribute is available to express the currency in which the amount is expressed.

minimumAmount.description: The minimum amount a person is willing to accept or an organization is willing to pay for a position.

maximumAmount.description: The maximum amount a person is willing to accept or an organization is willing to pay for a position.

intervalCode.description: An interval of time or other basis used to express a rate of pay or remuneration.
